== Compatible libraries ==

[http://www.asual.com/swfaddress/ SWFAddress] for deeplinking by Asual

[http://blog.pixelbreaker.com/flash/as30-mousewheel-on-mac-os-x/ AS3.0 MouseWheel on Mac OS X] by pixelbreaker

[http://swffit.millermedeiros.com swffit] by Miller Medeiros for Flash resizing

[http://www.flensed.com flensed] by Getify Solutions is a set of javascript+swf tools to spice up your websites with flash goodness

[http://www.gaiaflashframework.com Gaia] Framework for Adobe Flash

[http://www.dncompute.com/blog/2008/06/23/browsercanvas-the-worlds-easiest-way-to-dynamically-resize-flash.html BrowserCanvas] by doesnotcompute for dynamic Flash resizing

[http://jquery.thewikies.com/swfobject/ jQuery SWFObject plugin] by Jonathan Neal

[http://www.arjones.net/opensource/swfobject.net/ swfobject.net] .NET Webcontrol by Gustavo Arjones

[http://github.com/marcandre/swf_fu Ruby on Rails plugin] to interface with SWFObject 2.1 by Marc-Andre Lafortune
